mapper.sql: t1.id, t1.course, t1.name, t1.sex, t1.tel, t1.note, t1.date_created, t1.create_id, t1.create_ip, t1.last_updated, t1.update_id, t1.update_ip, t1.del_flag, t1.version, t1.status
mapper.insert: insert into tc_course_web_enroll ( id, course, name, sex, tel, note, date_created, create_id, create_ip, last_updated, update_id, update_ip, del_flag, version, status ) values ( #{id}, #{course}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{tel}, #{note}, now(), #{create_id}, #{create_ip}, now(), #{update_id}, #{update_ip}, '0', 0, '0' )
mapper.select: select count(0) from tc_course_web_enroll where id=#{id}

select
from tc_course_web_enroll t1 where 1=1
and t1.del_flag=#{del_flag}
and t1.del_flag='0'
and t1.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_created) >=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{date1})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_created) <=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{date2})
order by t1.date_created desc

select
from tc_course_web_enroll t1 where 1=1
and t1.del_flag=#{del_flag}
and t1.del_flag='0'
order by t1.date_created desc
